features: 8 color cream makeup palette with 4 CreamBlend foundation shades & 4 accent shades
Stipple sponge, non-latex sponge powder puff
Proudly Made in the USA since 1927
body.description: Together with the help of top theatre experts, we've created our “MINI-PRO” Professional Makeup Kits! Experience this kit equipped with exactly what any modern performer needs to get ready for his/her performance. Kit includes versatile colors and additional accent shades that can be used on the eyes, cheeks, lips etc. The selection of products is smarter and packaged in our new modern kit designs. Categorized in 3 simple shade kits; Fair/Olive Fair, Medium/Olive Medium and Medium Dark/Dark.How to Use:Apply with the Face Kabuki Brush in a circular motion and smooth out to desired coverage. Avoid pulling or stretching the skin. Gently apply around the eye area where the skin is very thin and delicate.The Mehron Story:Mehron Makeup has been the leader in professional makeup for over 90 years. Our products are used on the runway, stage, and movie sets around the world. Mehron Makeup is proud to offer distinct professional products for each of our three major makeup segments: beauty, body art, and performance. Proudly made in the USA since 1927.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on May 3, 2019
reviews.reviewText: I used this product for my makeup in a production of A Midsummer Night's Dream. It stayed on well, though I wish I'd had some cold cream to remove it. I used my fingers mostly to spread and apply, and used a bronzer brush instead of the puff pad to apply the setting powder. I like the look of it in the container - very nice and easy to use. Looks really nice and professional and re-packs into the box really easily.Warning - (this is not the products fault, it happens with all stage makeup, but) This Will Make You Break Out. Wash your face really well before and after using! But pimples are unavoidable!I liked the variety of foundation shades, and found that all four of them would work in a pinch. And the two pink options were nice, I didn't use the darker one since my character needed to be boyish, but will be a perfect lip color ofr a more feminine character. (The pink drops on my cheeks are paint, not from the kit - same goes for the green eyebrows) You have to be careful with the white not to smudge a bunch of other colors into it. I haven't tried the stipple sponge, but the brush and eyebrow pencil both work well. If I had a complaint it would be that after a while the pink I put on my eyelids got smudged and wrinkled. But overall this kit worked really well and I will still have enough for another production next season! (after three dress rehearsals and two performances)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 19, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars great for teaching stage makeup
reviews.reviewText: We had a performing Arts Camp and used the makeup kits to teach stage makeup. Perfect. The product was complete and very easy to use as an instructional tool.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 14, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I get this set every time I perform on stage and it’s super easy to use, comes with everything you’d need, and looks really good under stage lights.Tip: put on a good amount of moisturizer before you apply any of the stage makeup or it’ll dry out your face.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 19, 2018
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Terrific kit at a great price
reviews.reviewText: This is a perfect kit with many base colors to chose from. For a first-time performer “learning the ropes” it was a great purchase. We did 7 shows (no makeup changes) and by the 4th show I did need to switch to a slightly different color base, but that was really no big deal. For the variety and all the experimenting you can do with this kit, at the price, I was thrilled with my purchase.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 13, 2016
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars This kit was just exactly what I needed for my ...
reviews.reviewText: This kit was just exactly what I needed for my show this week. There are enough different shades of base to work for any fair skinned person, and the two shades of red/pink work perfectly for lips and cheeks. The makeup held well and required only minimal touch up at intermission (mostly on the lips because my character had several kissing scenes). After using it on my son and me for two dress rehearsals and two shows, there's even plenty left for my daughter to use next week in her own show. I'd definitely buy this again.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewText: The make up is fine. The “instruction manual” is about using the make up for “aging.”The powder puff doesn’t have a strap or handle….so how are you supposed to use it properly???

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 20, 2021
reviews.reviewText: Exactly as advertised. Arrived early. The right color for me and a better price than the Ben Nye student kits go for. Student kits are a good size for on the go or if you aren't sure about the colors you need and just want to try it out. Would buy again and will certainly recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 17, 2023

reviews.reviewTitle: good price point for a solid starter kit
reviews.reviewText: more than I hoped for. Met all my needs for the musical I was in

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United Kingdom on February 1, 2018

Reviewed in the United Kingdom on November 22, 2016
reviews.reviewText: Good quality make-up. Good range of tints. Application tools a bit meagre. All in all, a good amateur starter pack.
